meanings.sent1: I enjoy reseeing my favorite movie every year.
meanings.sent2: I am reseeing the beautiful sunset from yesterday in my mind.
meanings.sent3: After reseeing the same magic trick, I finally figured out how it was done.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a film that kept reseeing the same scenes over and over.
meanings.sent5: The detective kept reseeing the crime scene in his mind to find any missed clues.

meanings.definition: To view or watch something for a second time.
meanings.sent1: She is reseeing the video to catch any details she missed before.
meanings.sent2: I will be reseeing the play next weekend with my friends.
meanings.sent3: The teacher reseeing the students' presentations to give better feedback.
meanings.sent4: The athlete kept reseeing the replay of the game-winning goal in his head.
meanings.sent5: The scientist reseeing the experiment to confirm the unexpected results.
